product_name: Lezyne Pressure Drive CFH Pump with CO2 Inflator
long_description: The Lezyne Pressure Drive CFH Pump with CO2 Inflator smoothly integrates a regular pump with an efficient CO2 inflation system to help you get back on the saddle faster after a flat.
short_description: The Lezyne Pressure Drive CFH Pump with CO2 Inflator smoothly integrates a regular pump with an efficient CO2 inflation system to help you get back on the saddle faster after a flat.
